options.command: bash -c 'rm -rf dist/libs/shared-types && mkdir -p dist/libs/shared-types && npx tsc --project libs/shared-types/tsconfig.lib.json --skipLibCheck && rm -rf dist/libs/shared-types/shared-event-bus && cp libs/shared-types/README.md dist/libs/shared-types/ && cp libs/shared-types/package.json dist/libs/shared-types/'
